definition: respect for the aged
to respect/to venerate/to salute/to offer

prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough
home of respect for aged/nursing home
to respect the wise and venerate the worthy (idiom); to honor the great and the good
priority seating for the aged (on buses etc)

sentences.english: Respect the elders, love juniors , save all with mercy, care for others.
sentences.chinese: 敬老尊贤，爱护后进，慈悲渡众，关怀他人。

sentences.english: I hope the people at the nursing home appreciate you.
sentences.chinese: 我希望敬老院的人会很欣赏你。

sentences.english: We should respect our teachers. You shouldn't have answered your teacher back in class。
sentences.chinese: 我们应当尊敬老师，你不该在课上同老师顶嘴。

sentences.english: All students should respect their teachers.
sentences.chinese: 凡是学生就应当尊敬老师。

sentences.english: The government called on people to hold on to the tradition of respecting the old.
sentences.chinese: 当局招呼人平易近对于峙敬老的传统。

sentences.english: We should respect our teachers and parents.
sentences.chinese: 我们应该尊敬老师和父母。

sentences.english: Reverence for elders and veneration for virtuous ones has always been a wholesome tradition in China.
sentences.chinese: “敬老尊贤”一直是中国的优良传统。

sentences.english: Eg. Children should show respect for their teachers.
Our family is very pleased to have a such a good family tradition and honor the elderly.
sentences.chinese: 很高兴我们家有一个这么好的孝敬老人的家风。

sentences.english: Person in charge on behalf of all elderly nursing home Youth League game of the sympathy expressed his thanks.
sentences.chinese: 敬老院负责人代表全体老人对局团委的慰问表示感谢。

sentences.english: Students should give teachers respect, even outside of class.
sentences.chinese: 学生在所有场合都应该绝对尊敬老师。

sentences.english: Children should pay their respects to their teachers.
The students all respected their teachers, in general.
sentences.chinese: 一般说来，所有的学生都尊敬老师。

sentences.english: It's polite of the students to respect the teachers.
sentences.chinese: 学生尊敬老师是有礼貌的。

sentences.english: It is our traditional virtue to respect and honor the aged.
sentences.chinese: 尊老敬老是我们的传统美德。

sentences.english: A certain degree of social help in respect and care of the old is necessary.
sentences.chinese: 一定程度的社会化敬老助老，势在必行。

definition: respect the aged
respect the old and cherish the young
of all virtues filial piety is most important (idiom)
to respect the wise and venerate the worthy (idiom); to honor the great and the good
filial piety (Confucian virtue)/to be a good son or daughter
neighborly relations
pleasure from helping others (idiom)
to help the poor/almsgiving for the needy/to assist poor households or poor regions
filial piety and fraternal duty
to help those in distress (idiom)
generous care but a thrifty funeral/to look after one's parents generously, but not waste money on a lavish funeral
filial piety or obedience/mourning apparel
friendly affection/fraternal love
filial piety (a Confucian obligation)/respect and obedience to one's parents
hardworking and frugal
to show concern and care for
